thread.title: Dacor Celebrates 50 Year Commitment to Designing and Manufacturing in California
thread.title_full: Dacor Celebrates 50 Year Commitment to Designing and Manufacturing in California - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Dacor Celebrates 50 Year Commitment to Designing and Manufacturing in California
text:
Despite California’s challenging business climate, ultra-premium appliance manufacturer remains committed to staying in Los Angeles
LOS ANGELES, Calif.
Celebrating 50 years as an industry leader, Dacor ® continues to manufacture ultra-premium kitchen appliances in California and thrive despite the state’s challenging business climate.
“Reduced labor costs and tax incentives in other states may be attractive, but we are committed to designing and manufacturing in California,” said CEO Chuck Huebner. “Dacor has always called California home, and we look forward to calling it home for another 50 years.”
Tweet this: Despite CA's challenging #businessclimate, @DacorKitchen appliance manufacturer remains committed to staying in #LosAngeles
Since 1965, the Los Angeles area has provided Dacor an inspirational atmosphere where innovation thrives, allowing for the creation of numerous industry firsts including the world’s first smart professional cooking range for the home; the Dacor Discovery iQ 48” Dual-Fuel Range. Dacor remains focused on designing and manufacturing ultra-premium, American-made products, and is committed to maintaining a southern California headquarters.
“Our products are a direct reflection of the craftsmanship of skilled associates and the resources provided by the Los Angeles region,” said President Steve Joseph. “Other companies see California’s complex business environment as a barrier, but for the past 50 years it has inspired us to be more innovative and resourceful.”
In contrast to the many businesses that have left the state, Dacor has used the pressure of California’s business environment to catalyze its efforts. The company recognizes the strategic importance of providing American-made products of the highest quality and has no plans to alter its operating structure – one that has stood the test of time and promoted growth for five decades. To learn more about Dacor and its American- and California-made products, visit http://www.dacor.com .
Media Notes:
To schedule a factory tour, product demonstration or interview with President Steve Joseph and/or CEO Chuck Huebner, please contact Brenda Forman at Merlot Marketing at 916-285-9835 and brenda(at)merlotmarketing(dot)com.
About Dacor
Celebrating its 50th anniversary, Dacor is a manufacturer of ultra-premium kitchen appliances. Designed and built in California, Dacor’s cooking appliances integrate function and technology to create high-performing, intuitive products that reflect the lifestyle and needs of the passionate cook. Since 1965, Dacor has been responsible for many of the innovations that have improved the way people cook in the modern kitchen. Dacor is family-owned and embraces the legacy, heritage and expertise of a third generation to lead the company into a new age of cooking innovation. http://www.dacor.com .
